author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS LIKELY OVER PARTS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO TODAY...
summary: ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS LIKELY OVER PARTS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO TODAY... As of 5:00 AM MST Mon Oct 06 the center of Priscilla was located near 17.3, -107.4 with movement NNW at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 975 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS LIKELY OVER PARTS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO TODAY... As of 5:00 AM MST Mon Oct 06 the center of Priscilla was located near 17.3, -107.4 with movement NNW at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 975 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
